Text: TrialNerror,I hope you read my comment,because I would like you to know that your effort,providing the rest of us with such high quality up-loads,and even shows that I would otherwise have *NO** access too,especially having a family of three to support,and cant afford cable,you have provided my family with EXCELLENT entertainment,thank you!!
Those are my favorite kinds of comments.  That's the kind of stuff that makes me wanna keep doing what I do.  Thank you - and you're welcome :D
